item.title: No Tracking
item.description: I don’t track you. That’s a promise and a statement, this website works without Tracking. Inspired by Laura Kalbag, who was inspired by the footer text on Karolina Szczur’s website. Why The reason I do not use tracking is an idealistic one. I no longer want to collect data for Google, and I do not want to support trackable users across websites. Data sharing on the web is absolutely crazy, as this example of USAToday shows - GDPR is saving us Europeans again tho.
